shortcv.p: Ioanna Talanti is a graduate of the Department of Management Science and Technology in Athens University of Economics and Business. She has worked at the Marketing Department of Papasotiriou S.A. as an instructor of employees. From March 2005 till now is a research assistant in ISTLab/OIS. Her research interests are on the e-learning field as well as on the Human Resource Information Systems. Currently she is working on a research project of the adoption and usage of Human Resource Information Systems in Greece.
